alert.note: Alert for Coastal New Hanover; Inland Brunswick; Inland New Hanover (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 5:10PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central New Hanover and eastern Brunswick Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 510 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Silver Lake, or near Wilmington, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Wilmington, Wrightsville Beach, South Masonboro Island, Johnny Mercer Pier, North Masonboro Island, Myrtle Grove, Silver Lake, Masonboro, Seagate, New Hanover Regional Medical Center and Cape Fear Hospital. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Coastal New Hanover; Inland Brunswick; Inland New Hanover
